name: Juicebox Green
infoUri: There's no website, discord or twitter yet. In case of doubts talk to Zeugh, he's on the Juicebox server
description:
This is a project where you can direct funds from your project or directly contribute on combating climate change by the purchase and retirement of carbon credits.

The choice for the carbon offsetting initiative will be made after we achieve 1 ETH on the treasury and the exact strategy will be open for discussion.

I'm creating this to facilitate my own transactions on this sense, but feel free to join the movement by redirecting a small percentage of your project to it or donating directly.
payDisclosure: This project holds no financial return as goal, the offsetting of carbon is the goal here and any financial return that comes from it will be managed by the managers of it as they see more beneficial to the goal off making JB projects more aligned to Regenerative Finance, either through grants, bounties or the purchase of more Carbon Credits.
